ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Behala Srijan is registered non-profit organization, provides financial support to children of underprivileged families of Sunderban area from Primary to Higher Secondary level. One of such child â€“ Monalisa Das of Sonagaon, Sunderbans, has achieved good performance in studies after taking tuition guides supported by behala SRIJAN. Behala SRIJAN also donated study materials to underprivileged children gathered and brought by Tiljala SHED of Kolkata and FPSA-FRIENDS OF POOR & SOCIALLY ABANDONED from Bankura. It focuses on the propagation of Indian Traditional Music and promotes the talented artists of music and art by providing them a proper platform of performance and felicitating the legendary musicians to enable the cultural exchange of the eminent musicians with the young talents of the present generation. Some of such programmes were staged at Sisir Manch, Kolkata (10th March, 2014) and ICCR, Kolkata (28th July & 4th Nov, 2014). At present behala SRIJAN is now arranging such programmes at some other districts of West Bengal like South and North 24 Parganas, Howrah and Bankura. It also supports the artisans of remote area to keep their crafts and craftsmanship skill alive.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Bengal Social Service League herein after refer as BSSL founded on 13th Feb 1915 by DR Dijendra Nath Maitra the then resident Surgeon of Mayo Hospital Kolkata. Pandit Sivanath Sastri named it the Bangiya Hitasadhan Mandali. It is the oldest secular voluntary NGO in the country. Kabi Guru Rabindranath Tagore, Sir, P. C. Roy, Acharya J. C. Bose, Lord S. P. Sinha, Sri Ramananda Chatterjee, Dr. Brojendra Nath Sil, Mr. Sukumar Roy, Mr. Annie Basant, Sri Satyendra Nath Maitra and many other came to be associated with BSSL.Poet Rabindranath was the President of BSSL.Motto of BSSL was the development of ATMASHAKTI. BSSL organized conferences i) First All India Social Workers Conference, presided over by MAHATMA GANDHI, ii) 2nd Conference presided over by SREEMATI SAROJINI NAIDU iii) 3rd conference presided over by DR. D. N. Maitra, 4th conference presided over by Mr. ANNIE BASANT. In 1972 Secretary of BSSL Sri S. N. Maitra was given the NEHRU LITERACY award. BSSL also got the awards in literacy i) UNESCO KRUPSKAYA MEDAL in 1975, ii) UNESCO Iraq Literacy Prize in 1986, iii) 2nd prize for "Fully Illustrated Follow-up-Literacy Material" by the Asian Cultural Centre for UNESCO (ACCU) in 1992.

ngoList.address: BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) VILL.GAZOLE, P.O.GAZOLE,DIST.MALDA, PIN-732124
ngoList.title: BISHAN Ekti Natya Sanstha
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: It was on May 12, 1977- Sum 38 years ago BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) came into existence in Gazole, remote area of the district of Malda, which are the ST belt of West Bengal. A long span of near about four decades of relentless theatrical cultivation BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) had a long walk of success and failure juxtaposed with a series of innovative excitement. Apart from producing theatre BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) has been organizing different cultural function viz, arranging Seminars, Felicitation Ceremonies, Exhibition of Photos of different productions of different theatre organization, Theatre Workshop, BISHAN Natya Mela and also speeches on theatre. BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) has been on the talk of theatre lovers of almost all the provinces of india by some of its stage winning productions like - BHOMA, RAKTA KAROBI, KENONA MANUSH, PARAN MANDALER GHAR GEROSTHI, MAHAKALIR BACHHA, UPOJALI BISHOHARI, HOITE SABDHAN, SONAKHOCHA, DAKGHAR, RATHER RASHI, DUI HUJURER GAPPO, DAINE, PRATHAM PATH, KOJAGARI, SETHUA, NAISHA BHOJ, ANIKET, DRISTIPAT, AYESHA BIBIR KATARI, ALOKER SANDHANE, SHASTHI, DHOLIA, KOTHAI JABO, PORE PAOA CHODDA ANA, GOBRA PALIYECHHE, LATHI and child drama RAJAR PETE PROJAR PITHE, JADUR TULI, HINGSHUTE DAITYA, PROTIKHA, GANGA THEKE MOHONA, Tribal Acted Drama-PAHIL PATH and DAINE etc. Also directed by Probal Maitra and Tapash Bandopadhaya- the helmsman of the group. We have decided to make this dream in reality our drama group BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha), Inagurate a Nurshery school (SHAISAB for child education and make play actor) on 15th day of April 1998. BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) . BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) has travelled all over India with its dramas performing in some of the most prestigious festivals as well as small rural interiors and industrial suburbs. Theatre Festival for the groups latest production LATHI with the direction by Tapas Bandopadhaya. BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha) never thinks that all these they have been able to do of their own Support, assistance and above all inspiration from all the corners and particularly by the optimistic and Co-operative attitude of Government and prominent Private Organization have alwayas been plying a major role behind it. However BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha), will never deviate from their resolve to go on with an all out strive to ensure healthy progressive and affirmative milieu of positive culture in the country through their cumulative involvement in theatre and theatrical works. So far acknoledgements is concerned BISHAN (Ekti Natya Sanstha), had won these awards : * State Yuba Utsab-1996 (Best Actor â€“ Subir Thakur for the production "KOJAGARI".
